item.title: Little Amanda
item.description: The Sale As soon as Amanda got off from the school bus, she skipped merrily towards her home. The 11 year old girl couldn’t wait to meet her parents for she was well loved. They weren’t a very well-to-do family, however for she couldn’t have everything her little heart desired. Still, it didn’t bother the child because she understood the predicaments of her parents. She was obedient, intelligent, and was blessed with ravishing beauty- a real image of an angel.
